de.lessvoid.nifty.spi

Interface NiftyTexture


  • public interface NiftyTexture
    A NiftyTexture is a handle to a texture surface. A NiftyTexture can be rendered AND can be rendered to.
    Author:
    void

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Free the texture memory.
      int getAtlasId()
      Get the id of the atlas this texture is a part of.
      int getHeight()
      Get the height of this texture.
      double getU0()
      Get texture coordinate of top left corner of this texture in the texture atlas or 0 for non texture atlas texture.
      double getU1()
      Get texture coordinate of bottom right corner of this texture in the texture atlas or 0 for non texture atlas texture.
      double getV0()
      Get texture coordinate of top left corner of this texture in the texture atlas or 0 for non texture atlas texture.
      double getV1()
      Get texture coordinate of bottom right corner of this texture in the texture atlas or 0 for non texture atlas texture.
      int getWidth()
      Get the width of this texture.
      void saveAsPng(String filename)
      Save the content of the texture to a file with the given filename.

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Get the width of this texture.
        Returns:
        the texture width

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Get the height of this texture.
        Returns:
        the texture height

      • getAtlasId

        int getAtlasId()
        Get the id of the atlas this texture is a part of. In case there is no support for Texture atlas in an SPI implementation then this can be the texture id or anything else that identifies this texture. Please note: -1 is reserved and should not be returned by this method
        Returns:
        the texture id of the atlas this texture is a part of

      • getU0

        double getU0()
        Get texture coordinate of top left corner of this texture in the texture atlas or 0 for non texture atlas texture.
        Returns:
        texture coordinate U of this textures position in the texture atlas

      • getV0

        double getV0()
        Get texture coordinate of top left corner of this texture in the texture atlas or 0 for non texture atlas texture.
        Returns:
        texture coordinate V of this textures position in the texture atlas

      • getV1

        double getV1()
        Get texture coordinate of bottom right corner of this texture in the texture atlas or 0 for non texture atlas texture.
        Returns:
        texture coordinate U of this textures position in the texture atlas

      • getU1

        double getU1()
        Get texture coordinate of bottom right corner of this texture in the texture atlas or 0 for non texture atlas texture.
        Returns:
        texture coordinate V of this textures position in the texture atlas

      • saveAsPng

        void saveAsPng(String filename)
        Save the content of the texture to a file with the given filename. This is very useful for debugging render to texture issues.
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename to store the texture content to

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Free the texture memory. Call this if you don't plan to use this texture anymore to free any associated resources.
